typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Agentid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Designation as string,
		Contactno as integer,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BlobDource
source(output(
		maxkey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(scdkey) as maxkey from\ndbo.dim_agent',
	format: 'query') ~> Maxkey
source(output(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Targetref
BlobDource select(mapColumn(
		Src_Agentid = Agentid,
		Src_Name = Name,
		Src_Designation = Designation,
		Src_Contactno = Contactno,
		Src_Location = Location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Maxkey join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CrossJoin
CrossJoin, Targetref join(Src_Agentid == Agentid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split(Src_Agentid==Agentid,
	disjoint: false) ~> Checkmatch@(Match, UnMatch)
Checkmatch@UnMatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		scdkey as integer,
		Agentid as long,
		Agentname as string,
		Desination as string,
		contactno as long,
		Location as string,
		IsActive as integer,
		fromdate as date,
		todate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Agentid = Src_Agentid,
		Agentname = Src_Name,
		Desination = Src_Designation,
		contactno = Src_Contactno,
		Location = Src_Location
	)) ~> InsertTarget
